gcci.text: H100 supply stabilizes as US-East availability improves, with per‑hour pricing trending toward $3.34 and capex becoming more predictable for new clusters.

gtpi.text: DeepSeek-led API price wars and aggressive model distillation compress token costs toward $1.30/1M input, sharpening the efficiency race.

gagl.text: Kimi notes that rising AI loads approaching 160 TWh/year are stressing grids, driving utilities toward nuclear baseload to ensure reliability.

aipi.text: GLM observes market sentiment moderating as consolidation replaces runaway capex, with investors prioritizing sustainable growth over speculative builds.
